name: Encore
description:
Encore is part two/six of "Agency?", an ongoing experimental series of short-form games on deconstructing player agency.

My other games and written criticism at my site

My Twitter: @lightnarcissus

Credits:

Snippet of ending track from Reckoner's "Draped in Black

Most 3D assets from TurboSquid. SFX by Mike Koenig and Yannick

Instructions:Tap SPACE to clap. Use mouse to look around when not clapping.Average game should last anywhere between 20 seconds to infinity, until you're the only one left in the crowd.
